[Using the application cache (MDN)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Offline_resources_in_Firefox) ## HTML5 web application cacheAppCache AppCache * * * ## AppCache ### AppCache AppCache *html* *manifest* ... *manifest* **cache manifest** *manifest* *manifest* manifest pages *manifest* AppCache ### AppCache document AppCache 1. *manifest* AppCache manifest AppCache 2. AppCache manifest [window.applicationCache](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/DOM/window.applicationCache) *checking* HTTP manifest 3. manifest *noupdate* [window.applicationCache](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/DOM/window.applicationCache) manifest 4. manifest manifest [applicationCache.add()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/nsIDOMOfflineResourceList#add.28.29) HTTP *progress* *applicationCache* *error* 5. *cahced* *applicationCache* ### AppCache Chrome preferences Clear browsing data... [chrome://appcache-internals/](chrome://appcache-internals/) Safari preferences Empty cache AppCache manifest manifest *obsoleted* *applicationCache* AppCache OBSOLETE ## manifest ### manifest web *manifest* web manifest MIME type *text/cache-manifest* ### manifest manifest URI manifest manifest ### 1 manifest manifest www.example.com *example.appcache* ``` CACHE MANIFEST # v1 - 2011-08-13 # This is a comment. http://www.example.com/index.html http://www.example.com/header.png http://www.example.com/blah/blah ``` manifest CACHENETWORK FALLBACKCACHE AppCache v1 manifest AppCache *header.png* manifest manifest ** manifest manifest ** ### manifest CACHENERWORK FALLBACK manifest CACHENETWORK FALLBACK CACHE *manifest* CACHE NETWORK NETWORK FALLBACK FALLBACK URI URI CACHENETWORk FALLBACK manifest ### 2 manifest www.example.com manifest ``` CACHE MANIFEST # v1 2011-08-14 # This is another comment index.html cache.html style.css image1.png # Use from network if available NETWORK: network.html # Fallback content FALLBACK: / fallback.html ``` NETWORK FALLBACK `network.html` `fallback.html` / ### manifest manifest text/cache-manifest MIME type manifest UTF-8 BOM CACHE MANIFEST MANIFEST - **** Tab - **** # - **** CACHE NETWORK FALLBACK : - **** CACHE URI IRI FALLBACK URI IRINETWORK URI IRI * ** URI manifest URI manifest document** ## AppCache AppCache URI ** CACHE FALLBACK** - **Master Entries** Master Entries `` manifest HTML HTML http://www.example.com/entry.html ```

Application Cache Example

``` entry.html *example.appcache* entry.html Master Entries AppCache - **Explicit Entries** Explicit Entries manifest CACHE - **Network entries** manifest NETWORK web Network entries ** manifest Master Entries Master Entries AppCache ** - **Fallback entries** Fallback entries ## AppCache manifest URI - **UNCACHED** AppCache - **IDLE** AppCache - **CHECKING** manifest - **DOWNLOADING** manifest - **UPDATEREADY** AppCache swapCache *updateready* *cached* - **OBSOLETE** AppCache ## manifest JavaScript manifest manifest `window.applicationCache.status` ``` function onUpdateReady() { alert('found new version!'); } window.applicationCache.addEventListener('updateready', onUpdateReady); if(window.applicationCache.status === window.applicationCache.UPDATEREADY) { onUpdateReady(); } ``` manifest `window.applicationCache.update()` ## - GET `other-cached-page.html?parameterName=value` hash `other-cached-page.html#whatever?parameterName=value` - manifest `window.applicationCache.swapCache()` - `*.appcache` expires headers manifest Apache `ExpiresByType text/cache-manifest "access plus 0 seconds"`

if (response.responseText !== undefined) { if (response.responseText && response.status < 400) { // Not a real error, recover the content response = response.responseText; } else { // This is a proper error, deal with it return; } } // do something with 'response' }); [ Demo](http://appcache-demo.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/localstorage-cache/) ### ApplicationCache: ApplicationCacheApplicationCache ApplicationCache ... Post._content:
# Medium LESS Medium [LESS](http://lesscss.org/) CSS mixin Medium SUIT CSS __ __ DOM CSS class **Table of contents** - [JavaScript](#javascript) - [Utilities](#utilities) - [u-utilityName](#u-utilityName) - [Components](#components) - [componentName](#componentName) - [componentName--modifierName](#componentName--modifierName) - [componentName-descendantName](#componentName-descendantName) - [componentName.is-stateOfComponent](#is-stateOfComponent) - [Variables](#variables) - [colors](#colors) - [z-index](#zindex) - [font-weight](#fontweight) - [line-height](#lineheight) - [letter-spacing](#letterspacing) - [Polyfills](#polyfills) - [Formatting](#formatting) - [Spacing](#spacing) - [Quotes](#quotes) - [Performance](#performance) - [Specificity](#specificity) ## JavaScript : `js-` JavaScript classes JavaScript JavaScript class `js-` ``` html ``` **JavaScript classes ** ## Utilities Medium classes CSS non-polypill mixin ``` html

{$text}

``` ### u-utilityName : `u-` `u` ``` html

``` ## Components : `[--modifierName|-descendantName]` HTML CSS - root class - - ### ComponentName ``` css .myComponent { /* */ } ``` ``` html
``` ### componentName--modifierName class class __ HTML ``` css /* Core button */ .btn { /* */ } /* Default button style */ .btn--default { /* */ } ``` ``` html ``` ### componentName-descendantName class ``` html
``` ### componentName.is-stateOfComponent `is-stateName` ** class class ** JS / classes ``` css .tweet { /* */ } .tweet.is-expanded { /* */ } ``` ``` html
``` ## Variables : `-[componentName]` CSS grayLight highlightMenu ``` CSS @color-grayLighthighlightMenu: rgb(51, 51, 50); ``` ### Colors colors.less colors.less RGB RGBA hexHSL HSLA **Right:** ``` css rgb(50, 50, 50); rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.2); ``` **Wrong:** ``` css #FFF; #FFFFFF; white; hsl(120, 100%, 50%); hsla(120, 100%, 50%, 1); ``` ### z-index scale z-index.less z-index `@zIndex-1 - @zIndex-9` `@zIndex-9` ### Font Weight web fonts `font-weight` `bold` `font-weight` `.font-sansI7, .font-sansN7, ` ``` CSS N = normal I = italic 4 = normal font-weight 7 = bold font-weight ``` type.less type size, letter-spacing line height Raw sizes, spaces, and line heights type.less ``` CSS ex: @fontSize-micro @fontSize-smallest @fontSize-smaller @fontSize-small @fontSize-base @fontSize-large @fontSize-larger @fontSize-largest @fontSize-jumbo ``` See [Mozilla Developer Network font-weight](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/CSS/font-weight) for further reading. ### Line Height Type.less ``` CSS ex: @lineHeight-tightest @lineHeight-tighter @lineHeight-tight @lineHeight-baseSans @lineHeight-base @lineHeight-loose @lineHeight-looser ``` Alternatively, when using line height to vertically center a single line of text, be sure to set the line height to the height of the container - 1. ``` CSS .btn { height: 50px; line-height: 49px; } ``` ### Letter spacing ``` CSS @letterSpacing-tightest @letterSpacing-tighter @letterSpacing-tight @letterSpacing-normal @letterSpacing-loose @letterSpacing-looser ```` ## Polyfills mixin syntax: `m-` Medium mixin polyfills border radius mixin : ```css .m-borderRadius(@radius) { -webkit-border-radius: @radius; -moz-border-radius: @radius; border-radius: @radius; } ``` ## Formatting ### Spacing CSS **Right:** ``` css .content, .content-edit { } ``` **Wrong:** ``` css .content, .content-edit { } ``` CSS **Right:** ``` css .content { } .content-edit { } ``` **Wrong:** ``` css .content { } .content-edit { } ``` ### Quotes CSS LESS **Right:** ``` css background-image: url("/img/you.jpg"); font-family: "Helvetica Neue Light", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial; ``` **Wrong:** ``` css background-image: url(/img/you.jpg); font-family: Helvetica Neue Light, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial; ``` ## Performance ### Specificity ``` css ul.user-list li span a:hover { color: red; } ``` layout a span li DOM layout [https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/best-practices/rendering#UseEfficientCSSSelectors](https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/best-practices/rendering#UseEfficientCSSSelectors) `.user-list` `a` hover ``` css .user-list > a:hover { color: red; } ``` `.user-list` `a` class ``` css .user-list > .link-primary:hover { color: red; } ```

rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.2); ``` **Wrong:** ``` css #FFF; #FFFFFF; white; hsl(120, 100%, 50%); hsla(120, 100%, 50%, 1); ``` ### z-index scale z-index.less z-index `@zIndex-1 - @zIndex-9` `@zIndex-9` ### Font Weight web fonts `font-weight` `bold` `font-weight` `.font-sansI7, .font-sansN7, ` ``` CSS N = normal I = italic 4 = normal font-weight 7 = bold font-weight ``` type.less type size, letter-spacing line height Raw sizes, spaces, and line heights type.less ``` CSS ex: @fontSize-micro @fontSize-smallest @fontSize-smaller @fontSize-small @fontSize-base @fontSize-large @fontSize-larger @fontSize-largest @fontSize-jumbo ``` See [Mozilla Developer Network font-weight](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/CSS/font-weight) for further reading. ### Line Height Type.less ``` CSS ex: @lineHeight-tightest @lineHeight-tighter @lineHeight-tight @lineHeight-baseSans @lineHeight-base @lineHeight-loose @lineHeight-looser ``` Alternatively, when using line height to vertically center a single line of text, be sure to set the line height to the height of the container - 1. ``` CSS .btn { height: 50px; line-height: 49px; } ``` ### Letter spacing ``` CSS @letterSpacing-tightest @letterSpacing-tighter @letterSpacing-tight @letterSpacing-normal @letterSpacing-loose @letterSpacing-looser ```` ## Polyfills mixin syntax: `m-` Medium mixin polyfills border radius mixin : ```css .m-borderRadius(@radius) { -webkit-border-radius: @radius; -moz-border-radius: @radius; border-radius: @radius; } ``` ## Formatting ### Spacing CSS **Right:** ``` css .content, .content-edit { } ``` **Wrong:** ``` css .content, .content-edit { } ``` CSS **Right:** ``` css .content { } .content-edit { } ``` **Wrong:** ``` css .content { } .content-edit { } ``` ### Quotes CSS LESS **Right:** ``` css background-image: url("/img/you.jpg"); font-family: "Helvetica Neue Light", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial; ``` **Wrong:** ``` css background-image: url(/img/you.jpg); font-family: Helvetica Neue Light, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial; ``` ## Performance ### Specificity ``` css ul.user-list li span a:hover { color: red; } ``` layout a span li DOM layout [https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/best-practices/rendering#UseEfficientCSSSelectors](https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/best-practices/rendering#UseEfficientCSSSelectors) `.user-list` `a` hover ``` css .user-list > a:hover { color: red; } ``` `.user-list` `a` class ``` css .user-list > .link-primary:hover { color: red; } ```

` `block-level` `inline` `div` `inline` `inline-block`, **vertical-align** `inline` `inline-block` **vertical-align** `inline` `line-height` ## ## `inline` ![vertical-align](http://cdn.impressivewebs.com/2011-12/vertical-align-pic.jpg) JSBin `inline` [JSBin](http://jsbin.com/isuvob/edit#html,live "Vertical Align") ## ## **vertical-align** - baseline - bottom - middle - sub - super - text-bottom - text-top - top [Demo](http://jsbin.com/isuvob/edit#html,live "Demo") `vertical-align` `top` `text-top` `text-bottom` ## Middle ## **vertical-align: middle** **middle** x x-height **middle** text-middle [Demo](http://jsbin.com/apiqog/edit#html,live) x-height **middle** ## ## **vertical-align** `` `` ---------- ``` input { vertical-align: 100px; } span { vertical-align: 50%; } img { vertical-align: -300px; } ``` [W3C **vertical-align** ](http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/visudet.html#propdef-vertical-align "W3C **vertical-align** ") ## ## **vertical-align** `inline``inline-block` **PS** `inline` `inline-block`
